SEARCH
Package com.example.moodmasters.MVC

Interface MVCView

All Known Implementing Classes:
AlterMoodEventActivity, MenuScreenFragment, MoodHistoryArrayAdapter, MoodHistoryListActivity, MoodHistoryListView, SignupLoginScreenActivity
public interface MVCView
Class that represents the view part of the MVC framework, all UI classes will extend this interface if there exists a UI element in that class that can be interacted with that brings up a different activity or fragment, or initiates some sort of data manipulation in the backend. Once a UI interaction has taken place the View will request the controller to handle it bringing up a new activity or fragement, or communicate with the backend for data manipulation (this will depend on the UI element that was interacted with). If the UI interaction causes data manipulation in the backend the controller will ask the model to change said backend data and the model will update the view telling it that the data manipulation is finished.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static final MVCController
    controller
     

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    initialize(MVCModel model)
    The function that the model will call on initialization of view objects being inserted into the model, this is to account for possibly different code being run on initialization of the view being inserted into the model than on normal updates
    void
    update(MVCModel model)
    The function that the model will call on all objects that implement MVCView once a data manipulation event has occurred to update the view and notify it to possibly change its look

  • Field Details

    • controller

      static final MVCController controller

  • Method Details

    • update

      void update(MVCModel model)
      The function that the model will call on all objects that implement MVCView once a data manipulation event has occurred to update the view and notify it to possibly change its look
      Parameters:
      model - The model part of the MVC framework, used for easy access to the backend objects so the View has easy access to the changed data

    • initialize

      The function that the model will call on initialization of view objects being inserted into the model, this is to account for possibly different code being run on initialization of the view being inserted into the model than on normal updates
      Parameters:
      model - The model part of the MVC framework, used for easy access to the backend objects so the View has easy access to the changed data
